# Blueleaf

**Category:** Wealth Management Platform  
**Website:** https://www.blueleaf.com/  
**Support:** info@blueleaf.com | (877) 882-5287  

---

## Overview

Blueleaf is an all-in-one wealth management platform for RIA firms and financial advisors. The platform combines client engagement tools, investment reporting, billing automation, and portfolio rebalancing in a unified system designed for firms seeking growth and exceptional client delivery.

**Company:** Blueleaf Wealth Inc.  
**Location:** One Beacon St, 15th Floor, Boston, MA 02108  
**Support Portal:** https://support.blueleaf.com

## Product Description

Blueleaf provides a comprehensive wealth management system built around four core capabilities:

1. **Client Portal (Engagement) System** - A client engagement platform featuring social-style feeds, web & mobile apps, automated messaging, multi-media content, automated report delivery, and document vault capabilities.

2. **Reporting** - Interactive investment reporting with alerts, customizable formats, and auto delivery for both advisors and clients across mobile, web, messaging, and PDF formats. Features beautiful, customizable and branded reports with cross-practice business intelligence.

3. **Billing** - Automated wealth management billing with flexible fee rules and invoice delivery across custodial and held-away assets. Includes automated invoice delivery, flexible billing options, and customizable invoices.

4. **Rebalancing** - Portfolio rebalancing with drift monitoring, household-level views, and custodian-ready trade output. Features household or account-level rebalancing, drift dashboard & alerts, and sophisticated modeling.

## Key Features

- Multi-channel advisor & client experience (Web, Mobile & Email)
- Weekly automated client updates and engagement
- Beautiful, customizable and branded reporting
- Up to 90% monthly client engagement rates
- Aggregation-as-a-Service with direct client support
- Integration with major custodians and broker-dealers
- Document vault and secure messaging

## Integrations

Blueleaf is approved by and integrated with a wide variety of custodians, broker-dealers and other financial institutions. The platform supports data aggregation across custodial and held-away assets.
